pkgmetadata.longdescription: RT-QuIC Data Formatting and Analysis // Designed for the curation and analysis of data generated from real-time quaking-induced conversion (RT-QuIC) assays first described by Atarashi et al. (2011) doi:10.1038/nm.2294. 'quicR' calculates useful metrics such as maxpoint ratio: Rowden et al. (2023) doi:10.1099/vir.0.069906-0; time-to-threshold: Shi et al. (2013) doi:10.1186/2051-5960-1-44; and maximum slope. Integration with the output from plate readers allows for seamless input of raw data into the R environment.
